meanings.definition: (米国海軍・沿岸警備隊・NOAA士官隊)少尉
meanings.english_definition: (US Navy, Coast Guard, NOAA Corps) Lieutenant Junior Grade

examples.sentence: He was promoted to LTJG after two years of service.
examples.translation: 彼は2年の勤務の後、少尉に昇進した。

usage_notes.explanation: LTJG is an abbreviation used in the US Navy, Coast Guard, and NOAA Corps to denote the rank of Lieutenant Junior Grade. It is senior to Ensign and junior to Lieutenant.

readability_explanation.text: This is a military abbreviation, so readability is dependent on familiarity with military ranks.
